meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Adam Holquist Ryan McLaughlin Salvo Candela Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6582.

td.p: Adam Holquist, an environmental engineer from Erie, Pennsylvania
Ryan McLaughlin, a study hall supervisor and retail manager from Chicago, Illinois
Salvo Candela, a university administrator from New York, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $66,195)

tr.td: BIG CITY SUBURBS
(We'll give you the suburbs, you name the big city.)
"BODY" LANGUAGE
THE JACK LONDON READER
CATTLE CALL
DATA STRATA
PEOPLE MOST BEAUTIFUL COVER GIRLS
(Each appeared on the cover of the magazine as most beautiful in the world.)
